gnome.name: Ambassador Ferrnook
gnome.location: Located on the {{FLOOR[2]}} floor of Varrock Palace, in the region surrounding the stairs.

gnome.name: Ambassador Gimblewap

method.description: Gnome Glider #7 by entrance to Gnome Tree Village
Gnome Glider #7 by entrance to Gnome Tree Village

gnome.location: Located on the {{FLOOR[2]}} floor of Ardougne castle, generally wandering the hallway, but can get stuck in the rooms

gnome.name: Ambassador Spanfipple
gnome.location: Located on the {{FLOOR[2]}} floor of Falador castle, generally roaming the east side of the castle.

gnome.name: Brambickle

method.description: God Wars Dungeon Teleport, then run south, then run past the Thrower Trolls until you reach the ice path.
Trollheim Teleport, run down the mountain, then go up until you reach the ice path.
Fairy ring AJR, then climb up into the plateau.
Teleport Home to Relekka (requires home set in Rellekka)
Use a chipped home tablet to teleport to Rellekka, then travel east to climb up into the plateau
Use an enchanted lyre to teleport to Rellekka, then travel southeast to climb up into the plateau
Fremennik Province Lodestone, then travel southeast to climb up into the plateau.

gnome.location: Located near the exit of the Ice troll cave north of Trollheim, this gnome is generally one of the longest trips
